abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; historian David Burton examines history of personalized antique bottles in book Antique Sealed Bottles 1640-1900 and the Families Who Owned Them; Gemeentemuseum in The Hague will exhibit pair of Delft statues that had been separated for years; John and Mable Ringling Museum of Art will exhibit Ming Dynasty artifacts on loan from China.
lead_paragraph: A glass historian spent decades deciphering the codes of antique bottles.

headline.main: Personalized Bottles, Ceramic Royals and Chinese Artifacts
headline.print_headline: Personalized Bottles Offer Lessons in History

snippet: A glass historian spent decades deciphering the codes of antique bottles.

keywords.value: Ringling, John and Mable, Museum of Art
